> **stripTealComments**(`tealCode`): `string`

:::caution[Deprecated]
Use `AppManager.stripTealComments` instead.

Remove comments from TEAL Code
:::

## Parameters

### tealCode

`string`

The TEAL logic to compile

## Returns

`string`

The TEAL without comments
